help message: â†˜ï¸ After everyone joined the room and are ready, the game begins.
â†˜ï¸ Every player gets 7 cards. At every turn, the player must play one of his/her cards that have the same number or the same suit as the top card. This becomes the top card.
â†˜ï¸ If the player had no such card, he/she can take a random card from the deck, the plays it if possible. Otherwise skips the turn.
â†˜ï¸ Some cards have special abilities:
ğŸƒ Card 'A': Skips next player's turn.
ğŸƒ Card 2: You can choose a player and fine them by giving one of your own cards randomly to them.

ğŸƒ Card 7: After you play a '7', the next player has to play another 7, otherwise they will receive two penalty cards. If the second player plays a 7, and the third player doesn't have a 7, they will receive four penalty cards!  (For the next player, this will become six, then eight, and...)
ğŸƒ Card 8: You can play another card as a bonus.
ğŸƒ Card 10: This card changes the direction of the game. (For instance, if it's downward, it will become upward)
â†˜ï¸ The first player that finishes their card will win and get rank #1. Others will receive rank #2, #3, and so on.
